sentences.en: Evaluation of P is simplified if the square root terms are expanded by the binomial theorem.
sentences.cn: 如果按二项式定理展开来计算平方根,P的计算可以简化.

sentences.en: He initiated his pupils into the mysteries of the binomial theorem.
sentences.cn: 他给他的学生们讲授二项式定理的奥秘.

sentences.en: Pascal published a treatus on binomial coefficient.
sentences.cn: 帕斯克发表了关于二项系数的论文.

sentences.en: Pascal's triangle shows the binomial coefficients.
sentences.cn: 巴斯卡的三角显示二项式系数.

sentences.en: The binomial coefficients are ubiquitous in Combinational Theory.
sentences.cn: 二项系数在组合论中有普遍的应用.

sentences.en: The binomial model is a generally accepted method of valuing options.
sentences.cn: The二项式模式为一般被接受的估值方法的其中一种.

sentences.en: The binomial theorem for positive integral indices.
sentences.cn: 正整指数之二项式定理.

sentences.en: Theorem g is called binomial theorem.
This is nothing but the binomial expansion.

phrases.tran_cn: 负二项分布；负二项分配

trans.tran_en: referring to two names or terms

trans.tran_cn: 二项式，双名词组（由and连接的一对名词，两个名词的前后顺序不变，如knife and fork）
trans.tran_en: a mathematical expression that has two parts connected by the sign + or the sign −, for example 3x + 4y or x − 7
